name: Postdural Puncture Headache
chief_complaint: Severe headache that worsens when sitting or standing

lab_results.CSF analysis: Normal protein and glucose, possible low opening pressure

prognosis: Generally good with treatment; symptoms usually resolve within days to weeks
description: A postdural puncture headache occurs due to cerebrospinal fluid leakage after accidental dural puncture during procedures like epidural anesthesia or lumbar puncture. The reduced CSF volume leads to traction on pain-sensitive structures.
